Sgurr an Doire Leathain

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Sgurr an Doire Leathain is one of the seven Munros on the South Cluanie ridge; the summit is actually a short distance north of the ridge on a projecting spur.

Photo © Russel Wills from Geograph under CCSA licence.

 You have not climbed Sgurr an Doire Leathain.

Region: Kintail

Altitude: 1010 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 3.76/5
Rating: 3.8/5 (42 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

South Glen Shiel Ridge walk

Other routes and challenges

The northeast ridge looks to be a possible alternative route of ascent, though we can find no accounts of it as this Munro is almost invariably traversed along the ridge.
